verses.content: Chun, LALPA lunginsenna chu Israelhai chungah a ṭuong nawk ta thut a, “Fe la, Israel mihai le Juda mihai tiem vawng rawh,” tiin David chun an pawi tâwk dingin a chawktho a.
Chun, lal chun a kuoma um sipai hotu Joab kuoma chun, “Israel hnam po po lai hin Dana inthawka Beer- Seba chenin invâk vêl la mi ieng zât am an ni ka hriet theina dingin tiem vawng ro,” a ta.

Chun, Joab chun lal kuomah, “LALPA i Pathien chun mipuihai sukpungin, ieng zâta tam khawm, a lêt za khawm, lalpa ka pu a hin hmu hman raw se; nisienlakhawm, lalpa ka pu chun chu chu iengdinga hriet ân hâwk am a ni leh?” a ta.
Nisienlakhawm, lal thu chun Joab le a sipai hotuhai chu a hne tah a. Chuongchun, Joab le a sipai hotu- hai chu Israelhai tiem ding chun lal kuoma inthawk chu an suok tah a.
Chun, Jordan râl an va kai a, chun, Gad ruom laitak changtieng panga khaw um Aroera chun Jazer chenin umhmun an khuor a;
chun, Tahtim-hodsi le Gilead ram an tlung a; chun, Dan-jaan an tlung a, Zidon panin an fe pei a,
chun, Tura kul dâm an va tlung a; chun, Hiv mihai le Kanaan mihai khuohai po po an tlung a, chun, Judai simtieng Beer-sebaah an feh a.
Chuongchun, ram po po chu an fang suok hnung chun, thla kuo le ni sâwmhni zoah Jerusalemah an fe nâwk tah a.
Chun, Joab chun mihriem zât chin chu lal a pêk a; chun, Israel rama chun kâwlhnâm chawi mi, mi huoisen nuoi riet an um a; chun, Juda mi chu nuoi nga an um a.

Chun, mihriem an hang tiem zo chun David lungril chu a na ta hle el a. David chun LALPA kuomah, “Ka thilthawa hin nasatakin ka lo suol tah a nih; nisienlakhawm, tuhin aw LALPA, i siehlaw rîtlona hi sie hmang dingin ka ngên che, invêttakin ka lo thaw tah a nih,” a ta.
Chun, zîngkâra David a hang tho chun David zâwlnei, zâwlnei Gad kuomah LALPA thu a hung tlung a,
“Fe la, David kuomah, ‘LALPA- IN hieng ang hin a tih; thil kawng thum ka ruotpêk cheh a, i chunga ka thaw dingin pakhat thlang rawh,’ a tih a,” tiin.

Chuongchun, Gad chu David kuomah a feh a, a kuomah, “I rama hin kum sari ṭâm hung tlâk am, i hmêlma hmaa an hnawt sûng cheh a, thla thum lo tlân hmang hri am, i rama ni thum hri hung inlêng? a mi tirtu ieng angin am ka dawn ding a na, inngaituo la, mi hril raw khai,” a ta.
Chun, David chun Gad kuom- ah, “Ka lunginzîng hle el a, LALPA kutah tlulût phawt el lang; a zângaina chu a nasa hle sih a; mihriem kuta chen chu mîn tlûklûttir naw hram rawh,” a ta.
Chuongchun, LALPA chun Israel mihai lai chun zîngkâra in- thawkin hun ruot ang chen chu hri ân lêngtir a, chuongchun, mipuihai laia mi chu Dana inthawka Beer-Seba chenah mi sîng sari an thih a.

Chun, vântirkoin sukse dinga Jerusalem tienga a kut a hang inlet chun LALPAIN thil ṭha naw thaw a tum chu ân lêt a, mihai sukbo- hmangtu vântirko kuoma chun, “A hun tah ie, i kut inlet ta naw rawh,” a ta. Chun, LALPA vântirko chu Jebus mi Arauna hrizâwl bula chun a um a.

Chun, Davidin mi sukhlumtu vântirko a hmu chun LALPA a biek a, “Ngai ta, ka lo suol tah a, indik nawtakin thil ka lo thaw tah a nih; nisienlakhawm, hieng berâmhai hin ieng thil am an thawh a? I kut chun keima le ka pa sûnghai mi tâwk lem raw se aw,” a ta.
Chun, chu ni chun Gad chu David kuomah a feh a, a kuomah, “Hang fe la, Jebus mi Arauna hrizâwlah LALPA ta dingin mâichâm hang siem rawh,” a ta.
Chun, David chu LALPAIN thu a pêk anga, Gadin a hril ang chun a hang fe tah a.
Chun, Arauna chu a hei ngha a, ama tieng pana lal le a rawihai hung chu a hmuh a, chuongchun, Arauna chu a suok a, a hmaia hnuoi sikin lal hmaa chun a bawkkhup a.

Chun, Arauna chun, “Iengdinga ka pu lal chu a siehlaw kuoma hi hung am a nih a?” a ta. Chun, David chun, “Mipuihai laia inthawka hri hi ân kieng theina dingin LALPA ta dinga mâichâm siemna dinga i hrizâwl hi inchaw dingin,” a ta.

Chun, Arauna chun David kuomah, “Lalpa ka pu chun âwm a ti chu la sienla, inhlân raw se, en ta, pumrawhmanga inhlân dingin bâwngchalhai chu an um a; chun, thing dingin hrizâwl hmangruohai le sebâwng thuomhnawhai chu a um bawk a.
Aw, lalpa, hieng po po hi Arauna chun lal a pêk vawng a nih,” a ta. Chun, Arauna chun lal kuomah, “LALPA i Pathien chun hung dawn raw se che,” a ta.

Chun, lal chun Arauna kuomah, “Ni lo e, a man neiin ân châwk ngeiin inchawpêk lem ka ti che, iengkhawm insêng loin LALPA ka Pathien kuom- ah pumrawhmang thilinhlân inhlân naw tawp ka tih,” a ta. Chuongchun, David chun hrizâwl le sebâwngchal- hai chu tangka shekel sâwmngain ân châwk tah a.

Chun, David chun chutaka chun LALPA ta dingin mâichâm a siem a, pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai le inremna thilinhlânhai ân hlân a. Chuongchun, LALPA chu an ram chunga chun a lungâwi a, Israel rama inthawkin hri chu ân kieng tah a.24.24 1 Chr 21.34 24.25 Is 19.22
